comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Possibly Sloat's Dam and Mill Pond is located between Waldron Terrace and Ballard Avenue in Sloatsburg, New York, United States. The 200-foot–long (60 m) concrete dam creates the mill pond north of it by impounding the Ramapo River. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sloat's_Dam_and_Mill_Pond
